Thank you @ACS_OR for coming all the way to DC to meet with me and your tireless advocacy on behalf of cancer patients and their families. Some of the most expensive medications are biological drugs that are used in the treatment of many cancers and rare diseases. That's why I introduced the BIOSIMS Act today. All Oregonians must have access to these life-saving drugs without going bankrupt. https://schrader.house.gov/newsroom/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=392607&fbclid=IwAR1ePb-AgzqW58tDlCz-Re3u4tnsdkc9VcYfKsSSVE-yzaDxLTlLucuIqZA …

Gender-based violence drives up health care costs, contributes to crime, and causes lasting harm to families & communities. It must stop. I urge the Senate to take up the House-passed VAWA HR1585 of which I am a cosponsor! #VAWA4ALL

This suicide prevention month I am proud to be a cosponsor of the STANDUP Act which aims to prevent teen suicides, the second leading cause of death for young Americans. https://www.statesmanjournal.com/story/news/education/2019/09/11/suicide-prevention-salem-keizer-schools-increase-mental-health-services-address-stigma/2013393001/ …

Students in the Salem-Keizer district and throughout Oregon have been affected by suicide time and time again. Oregon’s rate of teen suicide is above the national average and we all have an important role to play in preventing these tragic deaths.

Some places are simply too wild and too fragile to drill-the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge is one of those places. I urge my Senate colleagues to pass this critical piece of legislation and protect the biological heart of the Arctic.

#ProtecttheArctic pic.twitter.com/dI0p6inady

Coastal communities rely on clean water and healthy beaches for tourism and fishing. Handing them over to Big Oil for more drilling destroys coastal economies & pollutes our oceans. Proud to vote with my House colleagues in support of HR 1941. #ProtectOurCoast pic.twitter.com/LBEw48FZtW

HR 4194 would amend the current 10 digit crisis number to simply 9-8-8. A shorter number that is easy to remember will help Americans get the support they need in times of crisis. I am a proud cosponsor of this commonsense bill.

We all have a role to play in preventing veteran suicide. Follow me on Facebook and here on Twitter throughout the month of September. If you are a veteran in crisis call 1-800-273-8255 or text 838255 for 24/7 support. 

#BeThere #SuicidePreventionMonth

September is Suicide Awareness Month. All month I will be sharing resources for veterans in crisis and stories of hope. Suicide is a national public health issue that affects families across the country, but-it is preventable.

Today is #NationalWildlifeDay where we celebrate the conservation and preservation of endangered species around the world. I am an original sponsor of the Recovering America’s Wildlife Act which would grant more funding to protect these unique creatures.
